description: It was a playful nod to actor Amanda Henderson, whose answer to a game show question went viral.
title: Greta Thunberg changes Twitter name to 'Sharon' after game show error
title_page: Greta Thunberg changes Twitter name to 'Sharon' after game show error - BBC News
maintext: "Greta's been saying Indians have died because they were defending the Amazon," Mr Bolsonaro had told reporters. "It's amazing how much space the press gives this kind of pirralha."
